name: Gravity (itch) (Geko Games)
description:
Gravity is a VR puzzle game, in which you must manipulate gravity to solve each level. The game has been built for room scale VR, but can be played in a small place.

Gravity was developed for research - investigating ways to reduce virtual reality sickness, without sacrificing immersion. The research project has reached the end of it's life (for now), and now I am making the game available for anyone to play. 

Gravity was designed to induce a very particular feeling of sickness, and does break some VR "rules" to do so. You shouldn't get too sick with this demo, but remember to take a break if you do.

Gravity features mechanics from similar games, such as:

  • Pressing buttons
  • Picking up, moving, and placing boxes on things
  • Falling

It also features some mechanics that similar games don't have:

  • Changing gravity
  • Holding two boxes at once

Controls

  • Both hands act the same. You can play with one controller if you wanted to!
  • Joystick / Touchpad moves with smooth locomotion. There is no teleport or turning options, sorry.
  • Trigger to change gravity or throw a held box.
  • Grip to pick up boxes.

Discuss on the Geko Games discord.
